channel.title: Pages on K.Q. Dreger
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on K.Q. Dreger

item.title: About this site and guy.
item.description:
Hi, I’m K.Q. Dreger. By day I work at Patriot where I get to empower our product and design teams as the director of product. By night I write about products, people, and purpose. And by nighter night I bake. Bread, mostly. I look like this:
Type set in IBM Plex Serif by Mike Abbink and Bold Monday and San Francisco by Apple. Written on a MacBook Air or iPhone 11 Pro.
